nodes.text: The Vaykaaris system was located in the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. In approximately 41 BBY, a terrorist group based in the system threatened more than a hundred worlds in the Colonies in what became known as the Vaykaaris Uprising. To resolve the dispute, twelve members of the Jedi Order were dispatched aboard the corvette Freedom's Messenger.
The Vaykaaris system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square K-13.
